original_text: The king said to them, ‘I will do whatever you think is good.’ So he stood beside the gate of the city while his army marched out. They marched out in their groups of hundreds and of thousands.
korean_text: 왕이 그들에게 이르되 너희가 좋게 여기는 대로 내가 행하리라 하고 문 곁에 왕이 서매 모든 백성이 백 명씩 천 명씩 대를 지어 나가는지라

sentences.original_text: I will do whatever you think is good
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희가 좋다고 생각하는 것은 무엇이든 하겠다

sentences.original_text: So he stood beside the gate of the city
They marched out in their groups
